original_title: 死ぬほど嫌われている隣人のキモ親父が、新婚妻をメロメロ・アヘアへ肉便器に催●洗脳できちゃいました。
overview: A disgusting dude is living in a shitty apartment and one day, a model-tier lady, Suzu, moves to live next door.  He decides to resort to hypnosis, to convince her to do creampie sex. The power of suggestion.
title: My Neighbor Is A Dirty Old Man Who Is Hated By Everyone, But He Used The Power Of Suggestion To Get This Newlywed Bride To Fall Helplessly In Love With Him And Become His Cum Bucket. Suzu Honjo
